title: Tera Hone Laga Hoon Lyrical Video - Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani | Atif Aslam | Ranbir, Katrina Kaif
description:
Sing along with Ranbir Kapoor and Katrina Kaif to the love anthem "Tera Hone Laga Hoon" from the movie "Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani" sung by Atif Aslam and Alisha Chinai.

Graphics : Prem Graphics PG.

Movie Cast & Crew :

Song Lyrics :

Shining in the sand in sun like a pearl up on the ocean

Thinking about the love n making The Life for sharing
